DOC.brief_summary: The investigator previous study show community gardening associate reduction key health behavior cancer prevention diverse population . Community gardener eat fruit vegetable per day , physically active , likely avoid age-associated increase body mass index ( BMI ) . The effect partially explain find gardener socially involve , feel social support non-gardeners . The investigator propose randomize controlled trial determine whether community garden improves cancer-preventive behavior among multi-ethnic , low-income adult population elucidate pathway shape cancer-preventive behavior . A randomized control trial need demonstrate observe behavioral difference due effect garden intervention rather self-selection gardener .
DOC.brief_title: Community Activation Prevention ( CAPs ) : A Study Community Gardening
